content.question: The map shows urbanized areas. Which of the following additional types of quantitative data will be most helpful to a geographer analyzing expansion of the urbanized areas shown on the map?

choices.label: A census tract map of each city and the surrounding counties showing the difference in population density over a ten-year period
A census tract map of each city and the surrounding counties showing the difference in household incomes over a ten-year period
A census tract map of each city and the surrounding counties showing the average age from the most recent ten-year census
A county map of each state showing total population from the most recent ten-year census
A county map of each state showing the change in average number of people per household from the most recent ten-year census

content.answer: A census tract map of each city and the surrounding counties showing the difference in population density over a ten-year period

unit.text: 6: Cities and Urban Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 3.E: Explain what maps or data imply or illustrate about geographic principles, processes, and outcomes.
